member.name: D3D12_RESOLVE_VIDEO_MOTION_VECTOR_HEAP_OUTPUT
member.summary: Receives output data from calls to .

member.name: D3D12_RESOLVE_VIDEO_MOTION_VECTOR_HEAP_OUTPUT.pMotionVectorTexture2D
member.summary: An representing the output resource for resolved motion vectors. Motion vectors are resolved to 2D textures. The resolved data is a signed 16-byte integer with quarter PEL units with the X vector component stored in the R component and the Y vector component stored in the G component. Motion vectors are stored in a 2D layout that corresponds to the pixel layout of the original input textures.

member.name: D3D12_RESOLVE_VIDEO_MOTION_VECTOR_HEAP_OUTPUT.MotionVectorCoordinate
member.summary: A structure specifying the output origin of the motion vectors. The remaining sub-region must be large enough to store all motion vectors per block specified by the input pixel with and pixel height and the specified .
